author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GIL EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE ON FRIDAY...
summary: ...GIL EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE ON FRIDAY... As of 11:00 AM HST Thu Jul 31 the center of Gil was located near 13.5, -117.2 with movement WNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...GIL EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE ON FRIDAY... As of 11:00 AM HST Thu Jul 31 the center of Gil was located near 13.5, -117.2 with movement WNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Gil (EP2/EP072025)
